questions.question: Where can I use Gatsby?
questions.answer: You can use Gatsby on any modern device with a web browser.

questions.question: Is Gatsby free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Gatsby is completely free for users.

questions.question: Does Gatsby have a mobile app?
questions.answer: Currently, Gatsby is a web-based platform and does not have a mobile app.

questions.question: What if I have no friends on Gatsby?
questions.answer: Gatsby can help you connect with others who share similar interests!

questions.question: What can I do with my friends on the app?
questions.answer: You can share recommendations, reviews, and discover new entertainment together.
